programme.title: Arena in 30
programme.desc: Arena Championship Series Central takes over the historic Greensboro Coliseum as Dragon’s Coty Saucier brings his series points lead to North Carolina. Reigning World Finals Racing Champion, Brandon Vinson tries to lead Grave Digger to the Overall Event Championship while Tony Ochs looks to take a bite out of the competition in the brand-new ThunderROARus.
